丑.definition: clown; 2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox; ancient Chinese compass point: 30°

丑時.definition: 1-3 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)

丑牛.definition: Year 2, year of the Bull or Ox (e.g. 2009)

丑角.definition: clown role in opera; clown; buffoon

丑鴨.definition: (bird species of China) harlequin duck (Histrionicus histrionicus)
